timeline.message: SAK-43196 msgcntr: Deprecated utils.FormattedText, Validator => api.FormattedText

timeline.bodyText: I'd leave this where it was. It just introduces noise to this change when merging back. It's a small thing, I know :)
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Are you using the slf4j annotation anywhere?
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure this is right. Validator.escapeJavascript is marked as deprecated, but the doc says to use StringEscapeUtils (Apache) instead. FormattedText doesn't use StringEscapeUtils. I'd either leave Validator here, or move FormattedText to use Apache (with the testing that'll need).
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Again, I'd leave this as Validator. FormattedText should be using URLEncoder, as per the doc in Validator.java.
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Why not go the whole hog and remove the setters for those other private vars in there? Just move @Setter to the class definition and strip those setters out. You may as well.
timeline.author: adrianfish
